predicate.note: Frames file for 'agitate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: It 's not so much the idea of acquisitions [*ICH*-2] that [*T*-1] has agitated the cosmetics industry as the companies doing the acquiring : P&G and Unilever bring with them great experience with mundane products like soap and toilet paper , [*-3] sparking disdain in the glitzy cosmetics trade ; but they also bring mammoth marketing clout , [*] sparking fear .
